Extract inc.zip to `<`EPOC32`>`\include, then the headers can be found in `<`EPOC32`>`\include\html.

Extract lib`_``<`PLATFORM`>`.zip to `<`EPOC32`>`\release, then the static libs can be found in `<`EPOC32`>`\release\winscw\udeb\htmlcontrol.lib and `<`EPOC32`>`\release\armv5\urel\htmlcontrol.lib(or `<`EPOC32`>`\release\thumb\urel\htmlcontrol.lib)
